section.p: 'Look!' screams one, pointing at you. 'An Exalted One! One of the chosen of Ebron!'

They fall to their knees and beg you to give them a blessing - they believe that the masked nobles and blue-skinned aristocrats of Uttaku are the descendant of Ebron himself. You find yourself surrounded by zealots, and have little choice but to attempt a blessing.
. If you are a member of the Church of Ebron, you can add one to the roll.
